lowest.description: Default background colour for all screens

high.description: Use to highlight and for hover states of neutral UI elements

higher.description: Selection color for neutral UI elements

inverse.description: inverse color of the default surface

inverseVariant.description: A lighter colour for inverse surfaces

low.description: Border colour for neutral UI elements in disabled state and seperators

high.description: Border colour for active neutral UI elements

secondary.description: Secondary text colour. Used for placeholder text and supplemantary information

disabled.description: Text colour for neutral disabled text in UI elements

lowest.description: Use for Containers of primary importance

low.description: Use for disabled states of primary UI elements

default.description: Default colour of primary UI elements and active states of navigation components

high.description: Use for hover states of primary elements

higher.description: Use on containers  and border color of elements with primary.low background

low.description: Use for containers of secondary importance

default.description: Use for secondary idle UI elements and borders of secondary containers

high.description: use for hover or active states of secondary elements

higher.description: Use on top of lighter secondary containers

low.description: use for containers that carry a meaning of validation and disabled state of validation UI elements

default.description: use for validation UI elements and borders of validation containers

high.description: use for hover states of validation UI elements

higher.description: use on top of validation.low containers

low.description: use for containers that carry a meaning of warning and disabled state of warning UI elements

default.description: use for warning UI elements and borders of warning containers

high.description: use for hover states of warning UI elements

higher.description: use on top of warning containers,  and warning text

low.description: use for containers that carry a meaning of error and disabled state of UI elements in error state

default.description: use for error UI elements and borders of error containers

high.description: use for error UI elements and borders of error containers

higher.description: use on top of error containers and error text

low.description: use for containers of info messages.

default.description: use for info idle UI elements and borders of info containers.

high.description: use for hover ad active states of info UI elements

higher.description: Use on top of lighter info containers.
